name: Add new PrestaShop orders to Google Sheets as rows
description: Streamline your order management process by automatically logging new orders from PrestaShop into Google Sheets. With this template, every time a new order is placed in your PrestaShop store, Make will instantly add the order details to a designated row in your Google Sheets. This ensures you have a real-time overview of your sales data, making it easier to track orders, analyze trends, and manage your inventory effectively. Perfect for e-commerce businesses looking to enhance their operational efficiency.
